title: New year sacrifice = Zhu fu [NTSC]

description: A tragic story that highlights the humiliations and hardships endured by women in traditional Chinese society, focusing on the life of a twice widowed, middle-aged village woman. Her last hopes of happiness are shattered by the news of the death her son. Cast includes Yang Bai and Wei Heling. In Mandarin with English subtitles. Based on the original work by the famous writer Lu Xun.
